1. สร้าง params.txt 
a = [25878775379916435970897911104324117011006856760361385819116931899733001450833, 80292504581484214867800448510497344370694961901882526138924856200258642618361, 54562238650714819533763937187273563560029710750904462184907724564346158140237, 30834807956188148036270093508097216410621697681321734280271104176585008500456, 100021623353561096459011931417514895295293439030681436367848867818327915003133, 114883990787912260454580419517456004259956645261473795279802857393219605918831, 71653771037370527186419961635116034068896374440180051189487380964719883267110, 91607645087989905993449554235941372492014761353844722410704930252180010806519, 28395936728383531129150159461256196090515745737460852339412603246679200310093, 78744580212206133101659179363885190682622412373183208856460085304775473217763, 775850249176581667952089839616870699525342651195058641544334315836518313201, 106589428030803202052170642987471602626322042957726190127628910207624491687876, 82971573736802740565553026442301125456963760676329174924439049281151933283911] c = 191525132692896166687925155732812051740711134546718181351363049498750742851036131
2. ใช้สคริปต์ตามนี้
import re, ast
from fpylll import IntegerMatrix, LLL

def load_params(path="params.txt"):
    s = open(path, "r", encoding="utf-8").read()
    a_txt = re.search(r"a\s*=\s*(\[[\s\S]*?\])", s)
    c_txt = re.search(r"c\s*=\s*([0-9]+)", s)
    if not a_txt or not c_txt:
        raise SystemExit("params.txt ต้องมี a = [...] และ c = ...")
    a = ast.literal_eval(a_txt.group(1))
    c = int(c_txt.group(1))
    return a, c

def is_printable_ascii(bs):
    # ยอมให้มีตัวพิเศษนิดหน่อย แต่ส่วนใหญ่ต้อง printable
    printable = sum(32 <= b <= 126 for b in bs)
    return printable >= int(len(bs) * 0.85)

def try_B(a, c, B):
    n = len(a)
    M = IntegerMatrix(n + 1, n + 1)

    # diag = B, last col = a[i]
    for i in range(n):
        M[i, i] = B
        M[i, n] = a[i]

    # last row = c
    M[n, n] = c

    LLL.reduction(M)

    # debug: ดูเวกเตอร์สั้น ๆ สัก 10 แถวแรก
    candidates = []
    for r in range(min(n+1, 12)):
        row = [int(M[r, j]) for j in range(n+1)]
        candidates.append((r, row[-1], max(abs(x) for x in row[:-1])))

    # หาเวกเตอร์ที่ทำให้ last component ใกล้ 0 มาก (มักเป็น 0 จริง ๆ)
    for r in range(n+1):
        row = [int(M[r, j]) for j in range(n+1)]
        if row[-1] == 0:
            # ต้อง "ปัดเศษ" ไม่ใช้ // เพราะมีติดลบ/ไม่ลงตัว
            bs = [abs(int(round(row[i] / B))) for i in range(n)]
            if all(0 <= b <= 127 for b in bs) and is_printable_ascii(bs):
                s = "".join(chr(b) for b in bs)
                return s, candidates

    return None, candidates

def main():
    a, c = load_params()
    n = len(a)
    print("[*] n =", n)
    print("[*] Start brute-scale B search...")

    # ลองช่วง B กว้าง ๆ (สำคัญมาก)
    ks = list(range(8, 81, 2)) + [96, 112, 128, 160, 192, 224, 256]
    for k in ks:
        B = 1 << k
        s, dbg = try_B(a, c, B)
        print(f"  - B=2^{k}  sample_dbg(first rows)=", dbg[:3])
        if s:
            print("\n[+] FOUND with B=2^%d" % k)
            print(s)
            return

    print("\n[-] Not found yet.")
    print("    ลองเพิ่มช่วง B หรือ relax เงื่อนไข printable ได้")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
